LanguageData.VCE_CondimentEffectsMint: Consuming meals that include this condiment increases social impact by 10%.
LanguageData.VCE_StartStewInsertionDesc: Bring a stew to the stew pot to start cooking
LanguageData.VCE_CancelBringingStewDesc: Cancel bringing stew to the stew pot.
LanguageData.VCE_StewFailurePower: The stew has spoiled due to a lack of fuel in the stew pot
LanguageData.VCE_StewFailurePowerWarning: The stew is spoiling fast due to a lack of fuel in the stew pot
LanguageData.VCE_FinishedSimpleStew: A simple stew is ready and waiting for pickup
LanguageData.VCE_FinishedFineStew: A fine stew is ready and waiting for pickup
LanguageData.VCE_FinishedLavishStew: A lavish stew is ready and waiting for pickup
LanguageData.MealUSAMRE.label: Make US Military MRE
Russian military IRP
LanguageData.MealUSAMRE.description: IRP of the Army of the Russian Federation (Individual Ration Pack). A securely packaged individual soldier's diet. It has a variety of dishes and snacks on the menu, focusing on meat and grains. It is famous for its meat pate and multifunctional biscuits.
LanguageData.MealUSAMRE.label: US Military MRE
LanguageData.MealUSAMRE.description: A US military Meal, Ready-to-Eat. Professionally prepared and packaged in portions, individual food ration. Tasty and nutritious, ideal for long field operations or survival in harsh environment. It is also an excellent alternative to crayons
